events.name: Talk CSS #10 CodePen Special Edition
events.description: Join us for a special CodePen edition of Talk.CSS. We have lots of goodies to give away so RVSP now! Latest CSS news by Talk.CSSOur new regular segment which will cover latest updates in the realm of CSS and HTML. Other speakers TBA If you want to do a lightning talk, please let us know before the event starts. We're more than happy to slot you in. CSS-related topics at ANY level are welcome because we're all here to learn and share. :) =========================================== General info We try to keep our timing tight so make sure you arrive close to the start time. Use the hash tag #SingaporeCSS whenever the urge comes.  Even if you're not a speaker this time, and get a sudden flash of inspiration, we welcome lightning talks too. Just poke us before the event starts and we'll slot you in. Lastly, if you want to speak or help out with anything, please contact Hui Jing or Chris.
events.location: Paypal at Suntec , 5 Temasek Blvd, #07-01 Suntec Tower Five, Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore

events.name: "Hands on your laptop" night! Scala, Angular 2, OAuth 2
events.description: Hi,  We are organising another "hands-on" night. As usual, you will have 3 tracks to choose from (so you will be doing only one).  You will need to bring a laptop so you can do the labs. ScalaWe had lots of good feedback from Mark Brewer's talk on Scala last week. Based on that, we thought that some of you guys would want to try it out.  Damien Neveu from Redmart will do an introduction lab to Scala for Java developers. Securing a Spring/Angular JS application using OAuth 2Using OAuth 2 can be complex.  Tony Nguyen and Dapeng Liu (Pivotal) have prepared a simple workshop so you can get started with it and become comfortable with the basics. Angular 2Unless you've been living on another planet, you must have heard that Angular JS 2 has been released last week. This version is a complete rewrite of Angular JS 1. Germain Potet from Zenika will guide you through the creation of a simple application using Angular 2. We look forward to seeing you on Wednesday!
events.location: PayPal office in Suntec, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985 Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore
